subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: As if it was possible to heighten the hyperbole of the Super Bowl, Patriots quarterback Tom Brady talked about the “biggest game in all of our lives” as an indelible part of his team’s future, whether they finish undefeated or not.
snippet: As if it was possible to heighten the hyperbole of the Super Bowl, Patriots quarterback Tom Brady talked about the “biggest game in all of our lives” as an indelible part of his team’s future, whether they finish undefeated or not.
